content.rendered:
Transform Your Salesforce Experience And Business Operations.

Hiring a Salesforce Administrator is an outdated solution – find out why!
Learn More
Get Pricing
Previous
Next

Why Are Companies Switching to Salesforce Managed Services?

Discover the Advantages of DTC Force Managed Services Over a Traditional Full-Time Administrator!

Learn More
Get Pricing

Gain Access To Our Diverse Salesforce Experts Holding 130+ Certifications At The Salary Of One Admin.

Previous
Next

Why Trust DTC Force With Your Salesforce?

Salesforce has awarded DTC Force with Summit Partner status, placing DTC Force in
the top 1% of all Salesforce Partners Globally.

Voices Of Success:
Hear From Some Of Our 300+ Satisfied Clients

“DTC did great work, they felt like part of our company while we were working on the project. They scoped everything out and really helped us step back and see the 50,000-foot view, and then zoom in on implementation. We could not be happier with the results of our project. We would recommend them to anyone for highly skilled customer-focused assistance with Salesforce implementations.”
Will MayNoble Gas Solutions
I had worked on a Salesforce build with another company, who did not complete the project and left it in an unusable state of disarray. DTCForce took on the project, revamped it and completed it with great knowledge and efficiency. I have
Jes StumpfVermont Surrogacy
“Jawad Nasser and Jack Grewal were excellent. They helped us to stay on schedule, were flexible in meeting with us when needed, and responsive to our needs for assistance. Excellent process, would both choose them again and recommend them to others.”
Andy LazarakisSiteworks
Previous
Next

Why Hire One Salesforce Admin When You Can Have Our Top Salesforce Experts Holding 130+ Certifications At The Same Cost

Invest wisely to diversify your Salesforce expertise with industry leading admin services.
Learn More
Get Pricing

Frequently Asked Questions

What services does DTC Force offer as a Managed Service Provider

DTC Force will provide comprehensive Salesforce services far beyond a typical Administration resource, including;

  • Services support all major Salesforce Clouds
    • (Sales, Service, Marketing, Experience, Field Service, CPQ)
  • Administration
  • Salesforce Consultancy & Best Practice Advisory
  • Platform Development
  • Integration Services
  • Platform Configuration
  • Training and Enablement
  • Data Management
  • Regular Salesforce Health Checks
  • Platform Architecture Assessment
  • Troubleshooting and Resolution
  • Monitoring Salesforce Updates and Releases
Are DTC Force’s Managed Services cost-effective compared to hiring additional Salesforce Administrative staff?

Yes, our services are designed to provide access to a wider range of Salesforce expertise at the cost equivalent of hiring a single administrator, thereby saving on hiring multiple experts.

Can DTC Force work with our existing Salesforce administrators and team?

Absolutely. We seamlessly integrate with your existing team, acting as an extension to enhance and support their efforts. We aim to complement your team’s work, bringing in additional expertise and insights to amplify your Salesforce results

What is our 30-day Risk-Free Trial Period?

All DTC Force Managed Services Agreements come with a 30-day grace period whereby the customer may adjust or discontinue the service.

How would you engage with DTC Force?

DTC Force is committed to fostering long-term partnerships and enabling seamless collaboration with our clients. Our team at DTC Force will communicate with you through your organization’s preferred communication channels. This includes, but is not limited to; email, Zoom, Google Meeting, Microsoft Teams, Slack, Zoho Projects, and more.

How easy is it to work with DTC Force?

DTC Force’s Manage Services are built by design to act as an extension to your team and existing operations. You can expect defined response & resolution times, in accordance with your managed service package.

How do I know what package is right for our organization?

Our Salesforce consultants will help ascertain a recommended level of service for your operational needs

Can I modify my service package during our contract term?

Yes, at any time you may purchase additional monthly hours or upgrade your package to a more suitable service offering.

What happens when Salesforce requirements exceed my monthly hour allocation?

Additional hours may be purchased at a fixed discounted rate.

What happens to unused hours?

Unused hours can be rolled over into the next month but will expire upon the contract completion date.

How am I billed for DTC Force’s Managed Services?

Annual and Quarterly options are available.

How does DTC Force ensure data security and compliance?

Data security is a top priority. We adhere to strict compliance standards and non-disclosure to robust security measures to protect your data.
